thread.title: Standard and Poor's cuts Brazil sovereign credit rating to junk
thread.title_full: Standard and Poor's cuts Brazil sovereign credit rating to junk

title: Standard and Poor's cuts Brazil sovereign credit rating to junk
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Sep 10, 2015, 00:06 BST - UK Markets open in 7 hrs 54 mins Standard and Poor's cuts Brazil sovereign credit rating to junk AFP – 14 minutes ago View Photo 

Standard (Other OTC: SNDH - news ) and Poor's cut Brazil's sovereign rating to junk Wednesday, citing the struggle by President Dilma Rousseff's government to master growing debt and political turmoil. 
"We are lowering the long-term foreign and local currency ratings on Brazil to 'BB+' and 'BBB-' respectively," the agency said in a statement.
